text: mina alladhina hadu yuharrifuna l-kalima ʿan mawadiʿihi wayaquluna samiʿ'na waʿasayna wa-is'maʿ ghayra mus'maʿin waraʿina layyan bi-alsinatihim wataʿnan fi l-dini walaw annahum qalu samiʿ'na wa-ataʿna wa-is'maʿ wa-unzur'na lakana khayran lahum wa-aqwama walakin laʿanahumu l-lahu bikuf'rihim fala yu'minuna illa qalilan
